parameter.name: password_only_remote_services_deny_list
parameter.description:
A comma-separated list of PAM service names that should always require MFA, regardless of the .B allow_console_password_only setting. These are typically remote access services where password-only authentication should never be permitted.
The PAM service name is the name passed by the application when calling .B pam_start() (e.g., "sshd", "login", "gdm-password").
Entries are matched as substrings, so "ssh" will match "ssh", "sshd", "openssh", etc.
